entities.name: dragon's blood
entities.description: A substance with twelve uses discovered by Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The Chief Warlock of the Wizengamot and a renowned wizard who defeated Grindelwald in 1945.

entities.name: grindelwald
entities.description: A wizard who engaged in a duel with Dumbledore in 1945.

entities.name: wizengamot
entities.description: An organization that Dumbledore was the Chief Warlock of.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Grindelwald engaged in a duel in 1945.
Dumbledore was the Chief Warlock of the Wizengamot.
